rules: Rule1: If the plant is invasive, then it threatens the animal.
Rule2: Provided that the plant is invasive, it is not the case that it threatens the animal.
Rule3: Either the plant is invasive or the game is effective.
Rule4: Whenever the game is designed, the tool is used in the game.
Rule5: The game is designed or the game is tested.
Rule6: Should the game be approved, then if the game is tested, the tool is developed for the game.
Rule7: If the game is played, then it is effective.
Rule8: Either the game is played or it is modified.
Rule9: Provided that the game is modified, it is improved.
Rule10: In the case that the game is evaluated, then if it is not the case that improving the game implies it is effective, the game does not fail.
Rule11: If the plant is removed, then it is not invasive.
Rule12: The plant is removed or the plant is controlled.
Rule13: Whenever the plant is assessed, then if it is not the case that controlling the plant implies it is not invasive, the plant spreads.
Rule14: If the plant is documented, then it is assessed.
Rule15: If the animal is bred, then it is released.
Rule16: Should the animal be released, it is relocated.
Rule17: Either the tool is applied or it is created.
Rule18: If the tool is created, then it is developed for the game.
Rule19: In the case that the tool is validated, then if the tool is applied, it is used in the game.
Rule20: Provided that the game is analyzed, then if it is not the case that not improving the game implies it is effective leads to the game not failing, the game succeeds.
Rule21: The game is analyzed or the game is reviewed.
Rule22: Should the game be reviewed, then if it is not the case that not improving the game implies it is effective leads to the game not failing, the game succeeds.
Rule23: If the region is monitored, then it is protected.
Rule24: In the event that the animal is stable, it is not endangered.
Rule25: Whenever the tool is used in the game, then if the game is not effective, the region is restored.
Rule26: Provided that the tool is developed for the game, then if the game is not effective, the region is restored.
Rule27: If it is not the case that improving the game implies it is effective, then the game fails.
Rule28: If it is not the case that controlling the plant implies it is not invasive, then the plant does not spread.
Rule29: Whenever it is not the case that rescuing the animal implies it is not endangered, the animal is bred.
Rule30: In the event that it is not the case that the game not being effective implies the region is monitored, the animal is rescued.
Rule31: If it is not the case that the game not being effective implies the region is monitored, then the animal is endangered.
Rule32: Provided that it is not the case that the game not being effective implies the region is monitored, the animal is stable.
Rule33: If the game is not effective, then it is not the case that the region is restored.
facts: Fact5: It is not the case that the animal is relocated.
Fact6: It is not the case that the region is protected.
Fact7: It is not the case that the game succeeds.
